subdisciplines.name: Solid-state physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of solid materials, including their properties, behavior under various conditions, and applications.

subdisciplines.name: Soft matter physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of materials that are neither solid nor liquid, including polymers, gels, and biological materials.

subdisciplines.name: Materials science
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties of materials and how those properties are influenced by the structure and composition of the materials.
